overview:
Akar Marbles Industries (AMI), unearthed this natural treasure in most eco-friendly way at it’s own quarries in the state -of-the-art processing plants, supported with professional marketing network ensuring the conformances of schedules.

Right from the quarries to processing plant and finally to the client, Our Staff attitude of working together for producing better quality is an asset. This vigilance has a front role in growing list of our overseas clients in U.S.A., Germany, Australia, Japan, Canada, Singapore, Mexico, Spain, Italy, S. Korea, Belgium, Dubai, and the list continues.
